example.en: It is fun to know that the beauty of Japanese gardens can't be found in other cultures.
example.vi: Điều lý thú là vẻ đẹp của các vườn Nhật Bản không tìm thấy trong bất cứ nền văn hóa nào.

example.en: I've seen nurses give my son throat cultures, and what is it?

example.en: All individuals and all cultures have ideals that cannot possibly be realized in reality.

example.en: I like to experiment between our cultures.
